overview: Tim thinks of himself as a passionate problem solver. He has been seeking out and solving business problems for over 7 years, creating solutions for companies both large and small. Particularly enjoying the fast paced environments of startups, Timâ€™s last role was as Lead Software Architect at Powerhouse Dynamics, developing products on the forefront of the energy management space. In his spare time Tim enjoys brainstorming new and innovative ideas, writing, and riding his motorcycle. Tim holds a Bachelors of Science from The University of Maine Orono.
